list_definition.definition: slight darkness caused by the blocking of some light

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I prefer to sit in the shade rather than the sun.

list_definition.definition: the dark parts of a picture

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: the clever use of light and shade in the portrait.

list_definition.definition: something that screens or shelters from light or heat
a variety of a colour/color; a slight difference

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The weather is a shade better today.

list_definition.definition: (sometimes with from) to shelter from light or heat

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He put up his hand to shade his eyes.
You should shade the foreground of that drawing.

list_definition.definition: (with into) to change very gradually eg from one colour/color to another.
